description:
Description
===========
With neutron, Although the subnet is not dhcp, we can not inject netconfig to guestos.

Steps to reproduce
==================
create a subnet with disable dhcp.
create a vm with the network and keep config-drive true 

Expected result
===============
we can see net config info in directory of content/0000 

Actual result
=============
no file of content/0000

Environment
===========
Kilo
title: [network] nova with neutron can not inject ip address to vm
